chainIDCSV.name: chainID
chainIDCSV.description: Chain ID to query (can be expressed as CSV).

blockchainAppStatus.name: status
blockchainAppStatus.description:
Status of the blockchain application. Can be expressed as CSV.
Accepted values: 'registered', 'activated', 'terminated', 'unregistered'.

network.name: network
network.description:
Network for which the application metadata is to be queried (can be expressed as CSV).

Accepted values: mainnet, testnet, betanet, devnet.

blockchainAppSearch.name: search
blockchainAppSearch.description: Search by name. Supports both partial and full text search.

chainName.name: chainName
chainName.description: Chain name to query. Supports case-insensitive chain name.

displayName.name: displayName
displayName.description: Display name to query. Supports case-insensitive display name.

searchByChainName.name: search
searchByChainName.description: Case-insensitive search by chain name. Supports both partial and full text search.

searchByChainAndDisplayName.name: search
searchByChainAndDisplayName.description: Case-insensitive search by chain name or display name. Supports both partial and full text search.
